Html:
I just downloaded and installed the Ribbon control to vs2010 and created a new WPF Ribbon Application via the project template. Works fine and all, but the right-click opo-up-menu option to add the button to the quick access toolbar is grayed out. 

I ran the more complex "word sample" which uses styles and datacontext bound to viewmodels, and the quick access stuff works well there. Any ideas?

Thanks for the help!
